title: Fragment, 1850–1900
medium: Technique: roller-printed on cotton plain weave foundation.
inscribed: All marks on front in brown. "20FS", "GREEN", "SHOOLBREDS CO 155 TOTTENHAM COURT ROAD" within frame, "ORDER 79", "14832" "1865" and "28" (the last three numbers in the same frame.
dimensions:
Warp: 10.5cm (4 1/8in.). Weft: 61 cm (24 in.). Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 4cm (1 1/2in.). Width: 3cm (1 1/4in.).                   Arranged as a half-drop.
description: Small, tight design of 'C' scrolls turned in various directions, dots and circles in green on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1850–1900.
1850–1900. Technique: roller-printed on cotton plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-18.
